mapper.insert: insert into hm_order (order_placer,order_number,check_type,check_time, check_out_time,day_count,phone,ID_number, ID_number_type,order_type,clerk_ordering_name, clerk_ordering_id,members_id, memberId_or_organizationId,total_price,create_time,hotel_id,channel,OTA,subscribe_remark) values (#{orderPlacer},#{orderNumber},#{checkType}, #{checkTime},#{checkOutTime},#{dayCount},#{phone},#{IDNumber}, #{IDNumberType},#{orderType}, #{clerkOrderingName},#{clerkOrderingId},#{membersId}, #{memberIdOrOrganizationId},#{totalPrice},now(),#{hotelId},#{channel},#{OTA},#{subscribeRemark})

insert into hm_order_child_backup
id=#{id},
room_rate=#{roomRate},
other_rate=#{otherRate},
practical_departure_time=#{practicalDepartureTime},
order_state=#{orderState},
room_major_state=#{roomMajorState},
mapper.select: select * from hm_order_child_backup where id=#{id}
mapper.update:
update hm_order_child
start_time=#{startTime},
end_time=#{endTime},
pay_cash_num=pay_cash_num+#{payCashNum},
other_pay_num=other_pay_num+#{otherPayNum},
room_rate=#{roomRate},
other_rate=#{otherRate},
timeout_rate=#{timeoutRate},
free_rate_num=#{freeRateNum},
order_state=#{orderState},
practical_departure_time=#{practicalDepartureTime},
remark=#{remark},
room_id=#{roomId},
room_type_id=#{roomTypeId},
al_room_code=#{alRoomCode},
night_auditor_state=#{nightAuditorState},
print_state=#{printState},
main=#{main},
update_time=now()
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select o.order_number,p.name,v.value,p.certificate_number,r.room_name, t.room_type_name,e.money,c.start_time,c.end_time,c.pay_cash_num,c.other_pay_num, c.room_rate,other_rate,c.free_rate_num from hm_order as o,hm_room as r,hm_room_type as t, hm_order_child as c,hm_dictionaries_value as v, hm_check_in_person as p,hm_everyday_room_price as e,hm_order_record as `or` where o.id=c.order_id and c.room_id=r.id and c.room_type_id=t.id and c.id=p.order_child_id and c.id=e.order_child_id and p.certificate_type=v.id and c.id=`or`.order_child_id and p.status='checkin' and (order_state='admissions') and o.hotel_id=#{hotelId} group by or.order_child_id
select * from hm_order where id = #{orderId}

select hm_order_child.*,hm_room.room_name,hm_room_type.room_type_name from hm_order_child,hm_room,hm_room_type where hm_order_child.room_id=hm_room.id and hm_order_child.room_type_id=hm_room_type.id and order_id=#{id}
select hm_order_child.*,hm_room_type.room_type_name from hm_order_child,hm_room_type where hm_order_child.room_type_id=hm_room_type.id and order_id=#{id} and order_state=#{orderState}

select hm_order_child.*,hm_room.room_name,hm_room_type.room_type_name from hm_order_child,hm_room,hm_room_type where hm_order_child.room_id=hm_room.id and hm_order_child.room_type_id=hm_room_type.id and order_id=#{id} and order_state=#{orderState}
select * from hm_order_child where order_state=#{orderState} and end_time < now() and practical_departure_time is null
select * from hm_order_child where order_state=#{orderState} and practical_departure_time < now()
mapper.update:
update hm_order
order_placer=#{orderPlacer},
phone=#{phone},
ID_number_type=#{IDNumberType},
ID_number=#{IDNumber},
check_type=#{checkType},
check_time=#{checkTime},
check_out_time=#{checkOutTime},
day_count=#{dayCount},
clerk_ordering_name=#{clerkOrderingName},
total_price=#{totalPrice},
OTA=#{OTA},
channel=#{channel},
update_time=now()
where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from hm_order_child where order_id=#{id} and orderState='reservation'
mapper.select: select oc.id,r.room_name as roomName,cp.name as name,cp.create_time as createTime,main from hm_order_child as oc,hm_check_in_person as cp,hm_room as r where oc.order_id=#{orderId} and oc.room_id=r.id and cp.order_child_id=oc.id and cp.status='checkin' group by order_child_id
select oc.id,ip.name,main from hm_order_child as oc,hm_check_in_person as ip where oc.id=ip.order_child_id and order_id=#{orderId} group by oc.id

select hm_order_child.*,hm_room.room_name,hm_room_type.room_type_name from hm_order_child,hm_room,hm_room_type where hm_order_child.id=#{id} and hm_room.room_type_id=hm_room_type.id and hm_order_child.room_id=hm_room.id
select * from hm_order_child where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update hm_order_child set order_state='cancel' where round((unix_timestamp(now())-unix_timestamp(update_time))/60)>15 and order_state='notpay'
mapper.select: select hm_order.id as orderId,time,hm_order_child.id as orderChildId,start_time,end_time, (room_rate+other_rate-free_rate_num) as totalConsumption, (pay_cash_num+other_pay_num) as sumPayment,channel, remark,al_room_code,OTA,money from hm_order_child,hm_order,hm_everyday_room_price where hm_order_child.order_id=hm_order.id and (order_state='admissions' or order_state='notpay') and hm_everyday_room_price.order_child_id=hm_order_child.id and room_id=#{roomId} and time = date_format(now(),'%y-%m-%d')

select name,hm_order_child.start_time,room_name from hm_check_in_person,hm_order_child,hm_room where hm_order_child.id=hm_check_in_person.order_child_id and hm_order_child.room_id=hm_room.id and al_room_code=#{code} and status='checkin' group by hm_room.id
select * from hm_order_child where al_room_code=#{code} and main=#{main}

select hm_order_child.id as orderChildId,hm_room.id as roomId,hm_check_in_person.name,hm_order_child.start_time from hm_order_child,hm_room,hm_check_in_person,hm_order where hm_order_child.room_id=hm_room.id and hm_order_child.main='yes' and hm_check_in_person.order_child_id=hm_order_child.id and hm_check_in_person.status='checkin' and hm_order_child.room_id!=#{roomId} and hm_order.hotel_id=#{hotelId} and hm_order_child.order_id=hm_order.id group by hm_order_child.id
SELECT money FROM `hm_everyday_room_price` where order_child_id =#{id} limit 0,1
